name: Pretty boy panic (Li route)
description:
You can't sleep well due to your noisy neighbors, there endless whispers  and muffled sounds keeps you up all night. You try confronting them only to find out that your living next to a bunch of pretty boys! (Who may or may not be psychopaths) Li route only available as of now. (10-15 minuets of game play)

A extremely rushes very fast paced horror otome game!

TW!!

This game includes themes of gore, stalking, kidnapping, dismemberment, and of course murder.

All music is from: https://pixabay.com/music/search/piano/
